titleStmt.title: Vnum necessarium. Or, The doctrine and practice of repentance. Describing the necessities and measures of a strict, a holy, and a Christian life. And rescued from popular errors. / By Jer. Taylor D.D.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.
Lombart, Pierre, 1612-1682, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Flesher for R. Royston, at the Angel in Ivy-lane.,

notesStmt.note: Title page in red and black.
With additional title page, engraved, signed: P. Lombart, fecit londini.
"A further explication of the doctrine of originall sin", also by Taylor, is often found bound after p. 448.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
